filmography.title: Modern Times
filmography.role_description: A spirited homeless woman who steals a loaf of bread and joins forces with the Tramp to survive in the industrial world.
filmography.plot: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

filmography.title: The Young in Heart
filmography.role_description: A pragmatic young woman who helps reform a family of con artists after they befriend a wealthy elderly lady.
filmography.plot: A family of con artists befriends a rich old woman to inherit her money, but her kindness begins to change them.

filmography.title: The Women
filmography.role_description: A chorus girl who ends up marrying the ex-husband of a gossiping socialite, holding her own in a circle of high-society sharks.
filmography.plot: A wealthy woman discovers her husband is having an affair with a shopgirl, leading to a divorce and a battle of wits among her social circle.

filmography.title: The Cat and the Canary
filmography.role_description: An heiress who must spend the night in a spooky mansion to inherit her uncle's fortune, while being stalked by a killer.
filmography.plot: An heiress inherits a fortune but must survive a night in a haunted house with a killer on the loose.

filmography.title: The Ghost Breakers
filmography.role_description: An American woman who inherits a haunted castle in Cuba and investigates it with the help of a radio broadcaster on the run.
filmography.plot: A radio reporter and an heiress travel to a small island off Cuba to inherit a castle that is reportedly haunted.

filmography.title: The Great Dictator
filmography.role_description: A courageous Jewish washerwoman in the ghetto who defends her neighbors against stormtroopers and inspires the Barber.
filmography.plot: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

filmography.title: North West Mounted Police
filmography.role_description: A fiery Métis woman who schemes to manipulate the men around her during the Riel Rebellion in Canada.
filmography.plot: A Texas Ranger joins forces with the Royal Canadian Mounted Police to stop a rebellion and catch a murderer.

filmography.title: Second Chorus
filmography.role_description: A band manager who becomes the object of rivalry between two competitive trumpet players played by Fred Astaire and Burgess Meredith.
filmography.plot: Two competitive trumpet players vie for the same job and the same girl.

filmography.title: Pot o' Gold
filmography.role_description: A music-loving Irish girl who helps James Stewart's character defy his wealthy uncle and get a band on the radio.
filmography.plot: A music-loving young man finds himself caught between his uncle's hatred of music and a band that needs his help.

filmography.title: Hold Back the Dawn
filmography.role_description: A cynical former dancer stuck in a Mexican border town who advises a gigolo on how to exploit an American woman for a visa.
filmography.plot: A European refugee marries an American schoolteacher in Mexico to get a visa, but finds himself falling in love with her.

filmography.title: Nothing But the Truth
filmography.role_description: A woman whose charitable fund becomes the stake in a bet where a stockbroker must tell the absolute truth for 24 hours.
filmography.plot: A man bets $10,000 that he can tell nothing but the truth for twenty-four hours, creating chaos in his personal and professional life.

filmography.title: The Lady Has Plans
filmography.role_description: A reporter who is mistaken for a spy with secret plans tattooed on her back, leading to espionage hijinks in Lisbon.
filmography.plot: A reporter is mistaken for a Nazi spy and gets caught up in a web of espionage in neutral Portugal.

filmography.title: Reap the Wild Wind
filmography.role_description: A headstrong salvage business owner in the Florida Keys who is torn between a lawyer and a sea captain.
filmography.plot: A ship captain and a lawyer fight over a salvage business and a woman in the 1840s Florida Keys.

filmography.title: The Forest Rangers
filmography.role_description: A wealthy city girl who impulsively marries a forest ranger and struggles to adapt to the rugged wilderness life.
filmography.plot: A forest ranger marries a society girl, but his former girlfriend tries to sabotage their relationship.

filmography.title: Star Spangled Rhythm
filmography.role_description: Appears as herself in a novelty musical number 'A Sweater, a Sarong, and a Peek-a-Boo Bang' alongside Dorothy Lamour and Veronica Lake.
filmography.plot: A sailor in Hollywood on leave tries to get his sister a movie contract with the help of Paramount's biggest stars.

filmography.title: The Crystal Ball
filmography.role_description: A down-on-her-luck woman who takes a job as a fortune teller's assistant and uses her position to win a man.
filmography.plot: A woman poses as a fortune teller to help a lawyer land a government property deal and win his heart.

filmography.title: So Proudly We Hail!
filmography.role_description: A spirited and brave Army nurse serving in the Philippines during WWII, a role that earned Goddard her only Oscar nomination.
filmography.plot: The story of a group of Red Cross nurses in the Philippines during the early days of World War II.

filmography.title: Standing Room Only
filmography.role_description: A secretary who travels to overcrowded wartime Washington D.C. with her boss and poses as a servant to secure housing.
filmography.plot: An executive and his secretary travel to Washington D.C. during WWII and pose as servants to get a room.

filmography.title: I Love a Soldier
filmography.role_description: A welder who vows never to marry a soldier to avoid the pain of loss, but finds herself falling for one anyway.
filmography.plot: A woman who works in a shipyard refuses to get serious with any servicemen until she meets a persistent soldier.

filmography.title: Kitty
filmography.role_description: A cockney street urchin in 18th-century London who is transformed into a lady by a nobleman and rises to high society.
filmography.plot: A gutter snipe in 18th-century London is groomed by a nobleman to marry into wealth and status.

filmography.title: The Diary of a Chambermaid
filmography.role_description: An ambitious chambermaid who takes a job in a rural French estate and manipulates the eccentric household to secure her future.
filmography.plot: A chambermaid uses her beauty and wits to manipulate the men in a wealthy French household.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Suddenly, It's Spring
filmography.role_description: A WAC officer who returns from the war to find her husband wants a divorce, but she refuses to sign the papers without a fight.
filmography.plot: A WAC captain returns home to find her husband wants a divorce to marry another woman, so she tries to win him back.

filmography.title: Unconquered
filmography.role_description: An English convict sent to the American colonies as an indentured servant, caught between a heroic militia captain and a villainous trader.
filmography.plot: A woman convict is bought by a peace-loving militia officer, but a corrupt trader also wants her.

filmography.title: An Ideal Husband
filmography.role_description: A scheming blackmailer who threatens to ruin a respected politician's career in this adaptation of Oscar Wilde's play.
filmography.plot: A woman attempts to blackmail a government minister with a past indiscretion in this Technicolor adaptation of Oscar Wilde's play.

filmography.title: Anna Lucasta
filmography.role_description: A streetwise woman kicked out by her father who tries to find respectability and love despite her family's interference.
filmography.plot: A woman banished by her family tries to start a new life, but her past and her family's greed threaten her happiness.

filmography.title: Bride of Vengeance
filmography.role_description: The infamous Italian noblewoman portrayed as a pawn of her brother Cesare, who plots revenge against a duke.
filmography.plot: Cesare Borgia uses his sister Lucretia as a political pawn to destroy the Duke of Ferrara.

filmography.title: The Torch
filmography.role_description: The fiery daughter of a Mexican aristocrat who falls in love with a revolutionary general.
filmography.plot: A revolutionary general takes over a Mexican town and falls for the daughter of the local nobility.

filmography.title: Vice Squad
filmography.role_description: A madam of an escort agency who gets caught in the middle of a police investigation and a bank robbery.
filmography.plot: A police captain tries to catch a cop-killer and bank robber while dealing with the daily grind of the vice squad.
